original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo anuvassaṁ vuṭṭhāpenti, upassayo na sammati.
analyzed: ▁tena ▁kho ▁pana ▁samayena ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁anu vass aṃ ▁vuṭṭhā pe nti ▁up assa yo ▁na ▁samma ti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo anuvassaṁ vuṭṭhāpessanti, upassayo na sammatī”ti.
analyzed: ▁kathañhi ▁nāma ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁anu vass aṃ ▁vuṭṭhā p essanti ▁up assa yo ▁na ▁samma tīti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—

analyzed: ▁kathañhi ▁nāma ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁anu vass aṃ ▁vuṭṭhā pe s s antīti ▁pe

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anuvassaṁ vuṭṭhāpessanti.
evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
“Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṁ vā ācariniṁ vā pattaṁ vā cīvaraṁ vā pariyesati, sīmaṁ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

original: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
